titles.title: A bill to redesignate the Office for Vocational and Adult Education as the Office of Career, Technical, and Adult Education.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: 5/22/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Amends the Department of Education Organization Act to redesignate the Office of Vocational and Adult Education of the Department of Education as the Office of Career, Technical, and Adult Education. Amends the Carl D. Perkins Career and Technical Education Act of 2006 to make conforming amendments.
